mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.station_code AS "stationCode", a.station_name AS "stationName", a.repertory_name AS "repertoryName", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM doc_station a
AND a.station_code LIKE '%'||#{stationCode}||'%' '%'+#{stationCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{stationCode}, '%')
AND a.station_name LIKE '%'||#{stationName}||'%' '%'+#{stationName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{stationName}, '%')
AND a.repertory_name LIKE '%'||#{repertoryName}||'%' '%'+#{repertoryName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{repertoryName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_station( station_code, station_name, repertory_name, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{stationCode}, #{stationName}, #{repertoryName}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_station SET station_code = #{stationCode}, station_name = #{stationName}, repertory_name = #{repertoryName}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
